title: COME, HOLY SPIRIT, WIND AND FIRE
composer: Alan J. Hommerding, Henri F. Hemy (1818-1888)

content: Come, Holy Spirit, Wind and Fire,
Come fill Your Church, our hearts inspire;
Darkness and chaos turned to light.
Voice of the prophets from above,
O Spirit, by Your power outpoured,
Blessed Mary bore the incarnate Word;
You o'er the Jordan's waters came,
That Christ the Gospel might proclaim.
Making the work of Christ complete;
Born of the water and Your grace,
We speak the Good News every place.
